author: Staff Reporer
text:
Means of effective implementation of the Juvenile Justice act was discussed at the consultation meet of District Juvenile Justice Committee held here on Sunday.

Fast Track Mahila Court Judge P.U. Chemmal who is presently holding additional charge of Principal District Judge presided over the meeting.

District Collector A. Gnanasekaran, Chief Judicial Magistrate R.Naaraja and Juvenile Justice Committee chairperson/ Principal Magistrate K.Malarkodi, members of Juvenile Justice committee, representatives of NGOs were present in the meeting.

Discussions

Discussions were all about observation homes for the children (Homes meant for temporary reception of any juvenile in conflict with law during the pendency of any inquiry against him / her) . and reception centres for the children in need of care and protection.

There were also discussions about appointing child psychological counsellors etc.

K. Thirumavelan, probation officer / District Child Protection Officer thanked the participants.
title: Implementation of Juvenile Justice Act discussed
